Reviews.Title: “A Latte In Roma”
Reviews.Author: satagtbct
Reviews.Content: returned spending 5 nights rome stayed couple hotel harmony roma fantastic hotel staffthe hotel beautiful clean stayed 408 views looking beautiful park breakfast lovely helps start sight seeing day fantastic location 15mins walk roma train station 25 mins walk approx trevi fountainspanish steps attractions walking dont walking catch metro tram cheap walked found map hotel receptionist useful lost stop cafe latte cappuccino cost 1 2 euros restaurants little cafes spoilt choice eat ice creams die omg lots lots macdonalds dotted wifi fall found rome taxi hotel prebook rouge taxi drivers rip found taxi roma central train station cost 10 euros hotel taxi unique taxi fined boot 3 4 digit doubt written receipt lots beggers gypsies money money hidden especially crowded dont capital city people lots visible police tourist attractions usually deter thiefs makes ease knowing police rome safe city day night weather mixed raining minute sun shine whilst snowed lol expect told hasnt snowed bad rome shopping expensive cheap shops depending buy shopped tourist haggled bargains english people dont haggle bargains eg pictures marble cherubs hand bags belts purses etc shoppers paradise yes deffinitely stay hotel harmony

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: AdeleL885
Reviews.Content: hotel 10 minute walk termini stazione pretty easy walk easy receptionists brilliant day offered excellent advice map instructions bus near hotel helpful information bus drivers dont sell tickets shop question silly receptionists happily answered lady serving breakfast lovely didnt speak english receptionist translate breakfast continental lovely stay

Reviews.Title: “Great bed and breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Trooper81
Reviews.Content: stayed price wouldnt stay location nice receptionist nice gentleman unfortunately remember name wearing glasses middle age bath bought camping tv age 30 channel properly am planing rome spring choice hotel definitely

Reviews.Title: “awful”
Reviews.Author: Querd
Reviews.Content: totally agree guys comment people exacly polite start reason beast shouting house kick honest hotel location else recommend try avoid hotel exept solution couple cuz aweful am 70 kilos tiny move pay check forget mention girl sitting hotel waiting pack started shouting inside sit living ready call police didnt didnt troubles time am italian else lawsuit hotel walking distance termini thats favour manager started nice jekyll reason beast yelling house whatever goes couldnt tried bathroom mouldy smelled awful shower upright coffin else toilet wouldnt flush airconditioning fan didnt internet didnt bed squeaked break rolled im person thats wouldnt wouldnt offered free accommodation

Reviews.Title: “Good value for a 6 Nations break”
Reviews.Author: travelling_matt_11
Reviews.Content: travelled rome italy scotland 6 nations game 2010 stayed hotel harmony 2 nights hotel quirky beaten track 2 blocks metro stop 15 minutes walk main roma termini rail station service hotel didnt lot call

Reviews.Title: “Dreadful”
Reviews.Author: Europeansummer2008
Reviews.Content: hotel walking distance termini thats favour manager started nice jekyll reason beast yelling house whatever goes couldnt tried bathroom mouldy smelled awful shower upright coffin else toilet wouldnt flush airconditioning fan didnt internet didnt bed squeaked break rolled im person thats wouldnt wouldnt offered free accommodation

Reviews.Title: “Very good value, We will be back!”
Reviews.Author: PeterAWilliams11
Reviews.Content: staff helpful friendly speak english particularly nicholas close city centre buses cheap handy frequent metro relatively close shops transport links selection restaurants easy walking distance restaurant road cheap clean airy double single breakfast basic continental breakfast simple provided start day toilet bathroom cramped booked weeks stayed third thanks volcano staff proved flexible internet connection machine facilities simple rooftop terrasse advantage situated nice town british embassy garden road hill cooler town centre 2 star hotel provided value

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Harmony Roma
HotelInfo.Address: Via Palestro, 13, 00185 Rome, Italy
